commands.name: az eventgrid namespace client-group create
commands.syntax:
az eventgrid namespace client-group create --client-group-name
                                           --namespace-name
                                           --resource-group
                                           [--description]
                                           [--group-query]
                                           [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
examples: az eventgrid namespace client-group create -g rg --namespace-name name -n client-group --group-query "attributes.floor=6"

commands.name: az eventgrid namespace client-group delete
commands.syntax:
az eventgrid namespace client-group delete [--client-group-name]
                                           [--ids]
                                           [--namespace-name]
                                           [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                           [--resource-group]
                                           [--subscription]
                                           [--yes]
examples: az eventgrid namespace client-group delete -g rg --namespace-name name -n client-group

commands.name: az eventgrid namespace client-group list
commands.summary: List all the client groups under a namespace.
examples: az eventgrid namespace client-group list -g rg --namespace-name name

commands.name: az eventgrid namespace client-group show
examples: az eventgrid namespace client-group show -g rg --namespace-name name -n client-group

commands.name: az eventgrid namespace client-group update
commands.syntax:
az eventgrid namespace client-group update [--add]
                                           [--client-group-name]
                                           [--description]
                                           [--force-string {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                           [--group-query]
                                           [--ids]
                                           [--namespace-name]
                                           [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                           [--remove]
                                           [--resource-group]
                                           [--set]
                                           [--subscription]
examples: az eventgrid namespace client-group update -g rg --namespace-name name -n client-group --description test

commands.name: az eventgrid namespace client-group wait
commands.summary: Place the CLI in a waiting state until a condition is met.
